titles.title: Producer and Agricultural Credit Enhancement Act of 2025
Producer and Agricultural Credit Enhancement Act of 2025
To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to modify limitations on amounts of farm ownership loans and operating loans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit
